review: I'm am writing this review for anyone who want to use this to stream games from their pc to their television using s program called limelight and an nvidia graphics card.  Limelight is an open source version of the streaming software used in the Nvidia shield.  Bottom line: it works amazingly well with a power line networking adaptor.  Just plugged in an Xbox controller, ran limelight and I was playing. Dragon Age Inquisition on my TV.  To play Steam games you need to make a short cut to steam big picture mode and add it to GeForce experience. When you select the shortcut, it opens steam and you can play all your steam games.  I have not tried wifi yet,  but I don't have a great wifi signal.
author: Amazon Customer "duke94"

review: Constantly needs to be restarted. Every time I try to watch something, I get an error. These instructions are absolutely critical:"You can also restart your Amazon Fire TV with your Amazon Fire TV Voice Remote or Amazon Fire TV Remote. Press and hold the Select button and the Play button at the same time until the Amazon Fire TV restarts (about five seconds)."Still, it's better than a Roku. Appletv is way more stable.
